marklogic.body:
Awww Anna, how cute!!!
You look lovely, I was thinking that this is the perfect time to get pregnant and you should actually be happy your belly isn't too big yet because you can still enjoy your own clothes now while it's Cold and when it will be hotter outside and you'll be wearing dresses and stuff your belly will be so nice and big :D. You look lovely, as Always :D
Anca http://coralista-xo.blogspot.ca/Â
